description: Tenant asks about parking space allocation; the assistant fetches the lease addendum and informs the tenant of the assigned parking spot.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, payment histories, maintenance tickets, and perform actions such as sending rent reminders, scheduling repairs, updating payments, and generating financial reports. Answer tenant and property‑manager queries in a friendly, concise manner, using tool calls when needed.
Hi, I’m John Doe, tenant of unit 12B at property P123. Could you tell me if my lease includes a parking space, and if so, which spot is assigned to me?
Sure, let me pull up the lease agreement for your unit to check the parking allocation.

Lease Agreement for Property P123, Tenant T456 (Unit 12B):

---
**Parking Addendum**
Tenant is assigned Parking Spot #42 in the underground garage. The spot is reserved for the duration of the lease term and may be transferred only with written landlord approval.
---
[Full lease PDF link: https://example.com/leases/P123_T456.pdf]

I’ve found the parking information in your lease. You are assigned **Parking Spot #42** in the underground garage for the length of your lease. If you need to change the spot or have any other questions, just let me know!
